translations: 用魔法迷住（witch 的第三人称单数）

sentences.sentence: They dress up as ghosts and witches.
sentences.translation: 他们打扮成幽灵和巫婆的样子。

sentences.sentence: Witches ain't got no power in the daytime.
He well knew the futility of trying to contend against witches, so he gave up discouraged.
sentences.translation: 他深知与女巫斗争是徒劳无益的，所以他灰心丧气地放弃了。
